1.description: Upgrade devices to 9.9.00 VisiLogic software, which requires users to change the default passwords on PLCs and HMIs. Use a strong password.

2.command: Disconnect the PLC from the public-facing internet
2.description: Disconnect the PLC from the public-facing internet to prevent unauthorized access.

3.description: Implement multifactor authentication for access to the operational technology (OT) network whenever applicable.

4.description: If you require remote access, implement a firewall and/or virtual private network (VPN) in front of the PLC to control network access.

5.description: Create strong backups of the logic and configurations of PLCs to enable fast recovery.

6.description: Keep your Unitronics and other PLC devices updated with the latest versions by the manufacturer.

7.command: Confirm third-party vendors are applying countermeasures
7.description: Confirm third-party vendors are applying the recommended countermeasures to mitigate exposure of these devices and all installed equipment.
